entry.title: Cross-compilation of PyTorch v1.9.0 armv7l for RaspberryPi OS Buster
entry.summary:
https://github.com/PINTO0309/pytorch4raspberrypi
1. Procedure A very time-consuming but very easy cross-compilation procedure. Performed on Ubuntu 20.04 x86_64.
$ docker run --rm --privileged multiarch/qemu-user-static --reset -p yes $ docker run --rm -it \ -v ${PWD}:...
